nodes.text: Superluminal transit was the Yuuzhan Vong method of faster-than-light travel. The Vong used organically grown creatures, such as dovin basals, to propel Koros-Strohna and other Vong craft.
As of this writing, it is unknown if the term Superluminal transit is simply the Yuuzhan Vong name for hyperspace, or another form of faster than light transportation entirely.
